Seems I've localized the issue and found temp solution.

In file "C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\VisualStudio\v12.0\TypeScript\Microsoft.TypeScript.targets"
there is such line:
```
<UsingTask TaskName="AssignTargetPath"       AssemblyName="Microsoft.Build.Tasks, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a"/>
```
After changing it to
```
  <UsingTask TaskName="AssignTargetPath"       AssemblyName="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.v4.0, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a"/>
```
the issue is gone.

So I guess the bug is occured because I have no installed .NET 2.0. I've just changed used "Microsoft.Build.Tasks" version from 2.0 to 4.0. Also it works when I used "12.0" as "Microsoft.Build.Tasks" version.
